text: Sisimpur is the Bangladeshi version of the American children's television series Sesame Street. It started in April 2005 on Bangladesh Television. Nayantara Communications make the show in Bangladesh and Sesame Workshop. Sisimpur is the first educational television program for children in Bangladesh. It was targeted that about 4 million children would view the program in the first two years. == References == Category:Sesame Street Category:Bangladeshi culture
title: Sisimpur
